alert.note: Alert for Custer County; Golden Valley County, Musselshell County; Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties; Stillwater County; Wheatland County, Sweet Grass County; Yellowstone County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 17 at 1:39PM MDT until September 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT MONDAY... * AFFECTED AREA: In South Central MT Fire Zones...124...125...127...128. In Southeast MT Fire Zones...130...132. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central MT...Golden Valley...Musselshell...Wheatland. In South Central MT...Stillwater...Sweet Grass...Yellowstone. In Southeast MT...Custer...Rosebud...Treasure. * IMPACTS: Low humidities, unseasonably warm temperatures, and strong gusty winds will create erratic fire behavior. * WIND: West 10 to 20 mph with gusts 20 to 35 mph. * HUMIDITY: 13 to 19 percent. * TEMPERATURES: 82 to 88.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Custer County; Golden Valley County, Musselshell County; Northern Rosebud, Northern Treasure Counties; Stillwater County; Wheatland County, Sweet Grass County; Yellowstone County
